scripts.publish-cpi-side-debug: cd cpi-side && npm run build:debug && cd .. && cpi-node-debug
scripts.build: cd ./cpi-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: cd ./cpi-side && npm install && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm install && cd ..
scripts.client:addon: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration SingleSpa && cd..
